articles.title: ESA Announces Satellite Constellation to Precisely Detect Man-Made Greenhouse Gas Emission Sources - Gadgets 360
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has announced a new mission where human-made emissions of greenhouse gases will be tracked from space. ESA, in collaboration with the European Union's (EU) Earth-monitoring programme Copernicus, announced this mission during th…
